name: express-mongo-rest-starter
description: CRUD REST API example with node/express and mongodb
author: leob <leobdev@gmail.com>

scripts.start: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon -r dotenv/config bin/www.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.debug: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon --debug-brk --inspect -r dotenv/config bin/www.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.test: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src/ nodemon -r dotenv/config test/index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
